name: Helmut Scheufele
biography: Scheufele’s career began with several years of practical experience in designing public and interior living spaces for the textile company Stuttgarter Gardinenfabrik. After several years Scheufele started his own design business in Berlin, which he continues to work out of today. He recently collaborated on the development of Walter Knoll carpets, which are inspired by the shapes and colors of Africa.  He has been recognized internationally for his work in architecture, textiles, and color design.
